mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company (company_id, company_name, start_date, end_date, company_logo, title, company_url, content) VALUES (COMPANY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{companyLogo}, #{title}, #{companyUrl}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET company_name = #{companyName}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, company_logo = #{companyLogo}, title = #{title}, company_url = #{companyUrl}, content = #{content} WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.company_name AS name FROM category1 c1 JOIN category2 c2 ON c1.category1_id = c2.category1_id JOIN company_category_relation ccr ON c2.category2_id = ccr.category2_id JOIN company c ON ccr.company_id = c.company_id WHERE ccr.category2_id = #{category2Id}
SELECT company_name FROM company WHERE company_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT c.company_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.company_logo, c.title, c.company_url, c.content, q.position FROM company c JOIN question q ON c.company_id = q.company_id WHERE c.company_name = #{companyName}
